OOC: Burning Hammer gets better at fighting, through thinking about former
and perhaps future battles, and thinking about what went wrong or could have
went wrong. Then he concentrates on not doing that again. With his mind at
work like that, he's a very imposing force...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, January 26, 2001 6:46 PM
Subject: Re: TRAINING


> Quick question.  How would gravity help a robot?  They're mechanical.
That
> means they don't get stronger with practice.  The only reason to train
would
> be to relieve stress.
>
>
